      • executeSearch

        public String executeSearch()
        Utility method that executes the search. Differs to the BaseSearchAction.execute() method in that this method doesn't execute the method BaseSearchAction.readFilterParams().

      • translateFilterValue

        protected String translateFilterValue(org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.search.OccurrenceSearchParameter param,
                          String value)
        Description copied from class: BaseSearchAction
        Optional hook for concrete search actions to define custom translations of filter values before they are send to the search service. For example to enable a simple checklist=nub filter without the need to know the real nub UUID. The values will NOT be translated for the UI and request parameters, only for the search and title lookup service! This method can be overriden to modify the returned value, by default it keeps it as it is.
        Overrides:
        translateFilterValue in class BaseSearchAction<org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.Occurrence,org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.search.OccurrenceSearchParameter,org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.search.OccurrenceSearchRequest>
        Parameters:
        param - the filter parameter the value belongs to
        value - the value to translate or return as is

      • getMaxAllowedOffset

        public Integer getMaxAllowedOffset()
        Calculates the maximum offset allowed using the current limit parameter.
